distortion.description: Distortion/saturation amount (0–1000, pad 4): 0 = perfectly clean, 1000 = max distortion/clip. Zero-padded.

aliasing.description: Aliasing index (0–1000, pad 4): 0 = none, 1000 = extremely aliased. Zero-padded.

reverb.description: Reverb/ambience amount (0–1000, pad 4): 0 = dry, 1000 = maximum reverb tail. Zero-padded.

mod_type.description: Modulation effect type: T = tremolo, R = ring mod, F = flanger, C = chorus. One uppercase letter, order T, R, F, C.

mod_depth.description: Modulation effect depth (0–1000, pad 4): 0 = off, 1000 = maximum. Zero-padded.

description: FXA (prefix), distortion (4 digits), aliasing (4 digits), reverb (4 digits), mod_type (1 letter), mod_depth (4 digits); zero-padded, no subvar prefixes. Example: FXA023405000972F0650 = distortion 0234, aliasing 0500, reverb 0972, flanger (F), depth 0650.
